description: Get the latest restore status of a volume.

commands.name: az netappfiles volume latest-restore-status current show
commands.summary: Get the latest status of the restore for a volume.
commands.syntax:
az netappfiles volume latest-restore-status current show [--account-name]
                                                         [--ids]
                                                         [--pool-name]
                                                         [--resource-group]
                                                         [--subscription]
                                                         [--volume-name]
